MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton, affecting properties in Low Waters Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:13pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and require a specialist team to assist with repairs. Our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 19:10 on Friday 26 March 2021.
